title: Sound bugged and couldn't hear anything all game
body:
Lost game because of this mistake and bug by Riot..... I want my lose removed. it is not fair. I was still positive, but lost because of mistake due to not hearing ping... When I relogged fixed it. But lost game because of it... If i don't get refund I will spam complain everywhere...

Tired of things like this stuffing me..

replies.body: Riot can't anticipate every technical and hardware issue that may ever possibly rise, not even for their own control computers. If they handed out free wins to players getting the slightest technical difficulty, then it would just be terrible.

exactly...
it could be anything... it couldve been even your own fault...
u cant blame riot for that...
you shouldve seen to the sound at the start of the game!!
this aint even an excuse..
dont cry and win another one...
